Grand_Junction.Grand Junction station:
The Grand Junction station is a train station in Grand Junction, Colorado, United States, that is served by Amtrak's (California Zephyr, which runs once daily between Chicago and Emeryville, California, in the San Francisco Bay Area.
Until 1992 Amtrak used the ex-Denver and Rio Grande Western Railroad (D&RGW) station, constructed in 1906, located next door to the current building. The current station building was built in the late 1970s and originally used as a restaurant.
